post.body: lol. Mine is well enough that he's throwing pieces of banana everywhere!
Merry Christmas to you too my TBF!!
That looks like my toddler typing. lol
Have fun for the both of us! Tell me how it goes Tbff!
Can't. Kids.
Hey there. I'm not on Facebook (pause for gasps and people fainting). Was on there once, but no longer. Any other url?
Twas funny indeed. I'm still laughing...
- @motionblur says there's a Toronto Tweetup on December 28th: http://tinyurl.com/8pbkq6
ok. I'm in.
Yeah. We should absolutely have a Toronto tweetup. I wonder if there was already.
After a long day, I'm ready to sleep for 20 hours!
Okay, party people. I'm out! Have a wonderful Christmas day! Enjoy the festivities and presents. Take care, Tweeple!
Keep hearing ways to monitize Twitter. How about custom profile pic headers? Yearly subscription? But would I pay? Dunno.
What do you do when the gov't bails you out? You spend $1.6 Billion on your top execs! http://tinyurl.com/7f7gjw
I have officially started the Christmas music. About to light a fire (even though it's +6C and raining). Let the festivities begin.
Serves me right for trying to tweet with baby in hand.
Sorry...who would have thought a 16 month old would randomly type an actual word...then press ENTER? Certainly not me!
Shot
Sh
Some are just addicted to twitter. Can't say I feel much different. http://tinyurl.com/9gpub5
